creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: original woodcut illustration of the Anthony Prize for the best daguerreotype.  The  print shows the massive silver pitcher which Edward Anthony offered for America's first photographic competition.  The Anthony Prize was won by Jeremiah Gurney for his whole plate portrait of his daughter.  Print published in 'Gleason's Drawing Room Companion', 1853.
title: The Anthony Prizes for the Best Daguerreotypes
